[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@thi.ng/interceptors](./interceptors.md) &gt; [forwardSideFx](./interceptors.forwardsidefx.md)

## forwardSideFx variable

Higher-order interceptor. Returns interceptor which unpacks payload from event and assigns it as is to given side effect ID. Assigns `true` to side effect if event has no payload.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
forwardSideFx: (fxID: string) => InterceptorFn
```
